articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Southeast Asian leaders to discuss Myanmar with coup leader - Rappler
articles.description: Diplomats and government officials who asked not to be named say many ASEAN leaders want a commitment from Min Aung Hlaing to restrain his security forces, who monitors say have killed 745 people so far
articles.content: The leaders of Indonesia, Vietnam, Singapore, Malaysia, Cambodia and Brunei, the chair, have confirmed their attendance, along with the foreign ministers of Thailand, and the Philippines.

articles.title: Southeast Asian leaders set for Myanmar crisis talks - CNA
articles.description: JAKARTA: Southeast Asian leaders will hold Myanmar crisis talks on Saturday (Apr 24) with junta leader Min Aung Hlaing who has become the focus of international outrage over a military coup and crackdown that has left more than 700 dead.
